channel.title: Getting rid of this god damn thread per client!
channel.description:
Alright well, i had max of 85 players on today... and thread per client is driving me insane, i have to restart server every freaking 20 minutes or it starts lagging like shit...
If anyone knows a tutorial for this, or is willing to show me how to get rid of that crap, please.. help me out.

item.title: Getting rid of this god damn thread per client!
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

I’m in desperate need for one, if this works… God I will be so relieved.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 06, 2009, 05:54:46 pm[/size][hr]Edit: thanks, but I get confused with the classes :[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 06, 2009, 06:01:24 pm[/size][hr]Edit again: this doesn’t work for delta… FML

Read full topic
